songs.title: Baby/Where Did Our Love Go
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Leigh-Anne & Jesy & All]
I know you love me, I know you care
Just shout whenever and I'll be there
You are my love, you are my heart
And we will never ever ever be apart
Are we an item? Boy, quit playing
We're just friends, what are you saying?
Said there's another and looked right in my eye
My first love broke my heart for the first time and I was like

[Chorus: All]
Baby, baby, baby oh
Like baby, baby, baby oh
Like baby, baby, baby oh
Like I thought you'd always be mine, mine

[Verse 2: Perrie & All]
And I'm in pieces, baby fix me
And just shake me 'til you wake me from this bad dream
I'm going down, down, down, down
And I just can't believe my first love won't be around

[Bridge: Jade]
Ooh, baby, baby
Where did our love go?
Oh, don't you want me
Don't you want me no more?
I've got this burning, burning
Yearning feeling inside me
Oh, deep inside me
And it hurts so bad, woah

[Chorus: All]
And I was like baby, baby, baby oh
Like baby, baby, baby oh
Like baby, baby, baby oh
Like I thought you'd always be mine, mine
Baby, baby, baby oh
Like baby, baby, baby oh
Like baby, baby, baby oh
I thought you'd always be mine, mine
